content.p: The Digital team are responsible for managing the flagship University of Nottingham social media channels on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube and Snapchat and for supporting student recruitment marketing through social media activity and advertising. The team works closely with colleagues in each Faculty Marketing team to enhance their digital content and drive interest in courses.They also work with a team of student Digital Ambassadors to showcase the university experience through takeovers of social media. The team works closely with colleagues in Communications and Advocacy to use relevant social media content and channels to enhance the Universityâ€™s reputation and engagement with stakeholders. They can advise on best practice content strategy and social media management to communicate with prospective students through paid and organic activity.
